data.text:
Where sports and celebrities met.

Between the years 1976–88 TV viewers were treated to the spectacle of Battle of the Network Stars. Back then there were three networks, ABC, CBS and NBC. The Battle gave the networks an opportunity to promote their various stars via featuring them in athletic competitions against their network rivals.

The actors chosen generally looked really good in swimsuits or shorts and tank tops. And I some of them could allegedly act.

It began on February 13, 1976

The ABC team was captained by Gabe Kaplan, while CBs was led by Telly Savalas and NBC was headed up Robert Conrad. The contingent of ABC won the competition.

The ABC squad had a stacked lineup, including Linda Carter and Farrah Fawcett-Majors. And that’s all I better say about that.

One of the events was a swimming relay which featured Linda Carter being matched up against Adrienne Barbeau. The fact I didn’t remember that until I looked at some old clips shows I really am getting old.

But that wasn’t the main event.

Gabe Kaplan vs. Robert Conrad
